questions.question_text: ‘…jem ā līmbaḍānu vṛukṣh chhe te ek vār jāṇī līdhu chhe, pachhī koī rīte manmā sankalp thato nathī je, ‘Līmbaḍo hashe ke nahī hoy?’ Evī rīte game teno sang thāy ane game tevā shāstra sāmbhaḷe paṇ koī rīte karīne Bhagwānnā swarūpno je nishchay karyo hoy temāthī man ḍag-mage nahī, evo je nirutthānpaṇe Bhagwānno nishchay ene ame ________ kahīe chhīe.”
questions.explanation: In Vach.Ga.Ma.14, Shriji Maharaj describes the quality of unwavering faith as 'tadātmakpanu'.

questions.question_text: Jene Bhagwānno ne santno _________-gnāne sahit nishchay hoy tethī Bhagwānne arthe ne santne arthe shu na thāy?
questions.explanation: Vach.Lo.3 states that one who has firm conviction along with the knowledge of the greatness of God and the Sant, what can they not do for God and the Sant?

questions.question_text: Āpaṇe to ________ jāvu chhe evo ek sankalp rākhavo.
questions.explanation: Swā.Vāto: 1/301 says that we should keep a resolution of going to Akshardham.

questions.question_text: Keṭalāk siddha thāy chhe ne keṭalāk sarvagna thāy chhe ne keṭalāk devatā thāy chhe ityādik anant prakārnī moṭyap pāme chhe tathā param padne pāme chhe e sarve Bhagwānnī _________ baḷe pāme chhe, paṇ upāsanā vinā koī vāt siddha thatī nathī.
questions.explanation: Vach.Ga.Pr.56 states that all attain greatness and the supreme state by the strength of devotion to Bhagwan; without devotion, nothing is attained.

questions.question_text: Tem ek Harine parhare, biji kare ________ koṭ; Te to māthāfar chāle mārge, jem jem chāle tem khoṭ.
questions.explanation: The kirtan 'Sārsiddhi' states, 'forsaking the one Lord, and performing millions of clever acts, they proceed astray; the more they proceed, the more they err'.

questions.question_text: Ene arthe kuṭumbno tyāg kare, ________ tyāg kare, rājyano tyāg kare, sukhno tyāg kare, dhanno tyāg kare, strīno tyāg kare ane strī hoy te puruṣhno tyāg kare.
questions.explanation: Vach.Lo.3 describes the sacrifices made for Bhagwan and the Sant, including abandoning family and social norms.

questions.question_text: Te sarvāḷo shāno melshe, je kare chhe ________ kāgaḷe.
questions.explanation: From the kirtan 'Sārsiddhi': Te sarvāḷo shāno melshe, je kare chhe kāḷap kāgaḷe.

questions.question_text: Paṇ upāsanā vinā koī ________ thatī nathī.
questions.explanation: Vach.Ga.Pr.56 emphasizes that without devotion, nothing is attained.
